channel.title: Ruby on Rails on OJ's Perspective
channel.description: Recent content in Ruby on Rails on OJ's Perspective

item.title: .NET MVC
item.description: Isn’t it amazing how life can just hit turbo without prior warning, and your time seems to just disappear! I need to find some way of sticking blogging back into my routine :) For the last couple of weeks I’ve been playing around a fair bit with Ruby and Rails. I’ve been having a great deal of fun at the same time, and I recommend it to any of you who are thinking of taking up some of your own time with learning web development.
